author: MIAMI BOLD EVENTS
title: MIAMI - FRIDAY JANUARY 5, 2024 - FAT JOE - HIP HOP PARTY PACKAGE, Stiles Hotel, Miami Beach, 5 January to 6 January
text:
Advertisement INCLUDES SOUTH BEACH 2 HOUR OPEN BAR • LIMO BUS TRANSFER • NO LINE NIGHTCLUB ADMISSION #1 NIGHTCLUB IN THE WORLD. DANCE/PARTY UNTIL 5AM!
About this Event
Our 7+ hour non-stop adrenaline-filled party tour will leave you breathless and with happy lifetime memories!
HOW IT WORKS and WHAT YOU GET?
1. PURCHASE $30 Early Bird RSVP or $40 RSVP ticket day of event to get on the guest list. Our events sell out fast so get your ticket(s) now. If event does not have enough tickets for your group we may have extra tickets so text us at 305-720-3695
Dress Code Strictly Enforced: Ladies must wear heels boots sneakers or wedges. No sandals no flip flops, no slides. no cut off shirts, no tank tops. no sports apparel. Men must wear nice shirt, pants and sneakers or shoes. Men no slides, no cut off shirts, no tank tops. no sports apparel.
2. CHECK IN 9:30p - 11:30p - Pay $80 Ladies $80 Guys remaining balance . Check-in location is 1120 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139. CHECK IN is required to redeem your ticket.
3. PRE-GAME-SMACK IN THE MIDDLE OF SOUTH BEACH - OPEN BAR 9:30p - 11:30p - Vodka, Gin, Rum, Tequila, Whiskey Drinks. No Champagne• No Wine• No Beer (BYOB welcome).
4. LIMO PARTY BUS RIDE to Main Event - 11:30PM - A "nightclub on wheels" with club sound and lighting and blue tooth select music.
5 . HOSTED "SKIP-THE-LINE" PRIVATE ENTRY INTO NIGHTCLUB
6. LET LOOSE AT NIGHTCLUB until 5:00 AM
TERMS AND CONDITIONS
No refunds. Refunds only for canceled events.
Dress Code Strictly Enforced: Ladies must wear heels boots sneakers or wedges. No sandals no flip flops, no slides. no cut off shirts, no tank tops. no sports apparel. Men must wear nice shirt, pants and sneakers or shoes. Men no slides, no cut off shirts, no tank tops. no sports apparel.
Must be 21+ to attend the event.
$30 Early Bird RSVP or $40 RSVP ticket day of event required to get on the guest list.
$80 Ladies $80 Guys remaining balance due at check-in. Cash only.
Limo Bus departs at 1``1:30 PM. Don't miss the bus or you will miss event.
Limo Bus is one-way. Take UBER/LYFT back to check-in location.
Prices and availability subject to change without notice for special events and holidays.
Advertisement Event Venue & Nearby Stays Stiles Hotel, 1120 Collins Ave, Miami Beach, United States
Tickets USD 30.00 to USD 40.00
